test.name: Validate Logout Functionality

kw.name: Comment
kw.arg: Log in using a valid standard user and confirm successful login
kw.doc: Displays the given messages in the log file as keyword arguments.

kw.name: Login And Validate
kw.msg: No alert for user: standard_user No modal appeared for user: standard_user Dashboard visible for user: standard_user

kw.name: Comment
kw.arg: Confirm that the dashboard is displayed if login was successful
kw.doc: Displays the given messages in the log file as keyword arguments.

kw.name: Validate Dashboard If Expected Success
kw.doc: Validates whether the dashboard is visible or an error message is shown, based on the expected login outcome for the given user.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Comment
kw.arg: Click the logout button to initiate user sign-out
kw.doc: Displays the given messages in the log file as keyword arguments.

kw.name: Click Logout Button
kw.msg: Logout button clicked, returning to login screen
kw.doc: Opens the side menu and clicks the logout button to return to the login screen.

kw.name: Comment
kw.arg: Verify that the login page is displayed after logout
kw.doc: Displays the given messages in the log file as keyword arguments.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Comment
kw.arg: Log confirmation that logout was successful and user is redirected
kw.doc: Displays the given messages in the log file as keyword arguments.

kw.name: Log
kw.msg: Logout successful, user returned to login screen
kw.arg: Logout successful, user returned to login screen
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

test.doc: Check whether the logout button is visible after login and whether clicking it properly logs the user out.
